title: Horizontal-product-card-grid Widget
description: A grid of horizontal product cards displaying product information with cart functionality

products.description: Array of product items to display

For.description: Target audience or use case for the product

enableQuantityIndicator.description: Whether to show quantity indicators for products

isCartUpdating.description: Whether the cart is currently being updated

itemBeingAddedToCart.description: Identifier of the item currently being added to cart

cartItems.description: Current items in the cart, indexed by SKU. Keys are product SKUs, values are objects with qty property.

qty.description: Quantity of the item in cart

source.description: Source identifier for the product data

showEmptyState.description: Whether to show an empty state when no products are available

emptyState.description: Configuration for the empty state display

title.description: Title text for the empty state

subtitle.description: Subtitle text for the empty state

image.description: Image URL for the empty state

shouldOpenMiniPdp.description: Whether clicking a product should open a mini PDP

miniPdpCta.description: Configuration for the mini PDP call-to-action

showMobileViewOnDesktop.description: Whether to show mobile view on desktop devices
